en.label: Ship City Standard Calendar (Coriolis: The Great Dark)
en.description: The Ship City Standard calendar used in The Great Dark, based on Old Horizon traditions and updated by the Navigators Guild. Features a 360-day Cycle-Orbit divided into 12 segments dedicated to Old Horizon systems.

months.name: Kua
months.description: The first segment, dedicated to the Kua system from the Old Horizon.

months.name: Dabaran
months.description: The second segment, dedicated to the Dabaran system, once a center of commerce and trade.

months.name: Zalos
months.description: The third segment, dedicated to the Zalos system, known for its harsh environments.

months.name: Algol
months.description: The fourth segment, dedicated to the Algol system, shrouded in mystery and danger.

months.name: Mira
months.description: The fifth segment, dedicated to the Mira system, once famed for its beauty.

months.name: Menkar
months.description: The sixth segment, dedicated to the Menkar system, home to ancient ruins.

months.name: Taoan
months.description: The seventh segment, dedicated to the Taoan system, known for technological innovation.

months.name: Sadaal
months.description: The eighth segment, dedicated to the Sadaal system, once a religious center.

months.name: Aiwaz
months.description: The ninth segment, dedicated to the Aiwaz system, mysterious and little-known.

months.name: Odacon
months.description: The tenth segment, dedicated to the Odacon system, famous for its warrior cultures.

months.name: Eridani
months.description: The eleventh segment, dedicated to the Eridani system, a hub of learning.

months.name: Aldebaran
months.description: The twelfth and final segment, dedicated to the Aldebaran system, the legendary origin of humanity's journey.

weekdays.name: Moonday
weekdays.description: The first day of the week, named for the ancient moons of lost worlds.

weekdays.name: Harrowsday
weekdays.description: The second day of the week, a day of toil and hardship in the Ship City.

weekdays.name: Marketday
weekdays.description: The third day of the week, when the food markets in the Gardens and Chasm reach their peak activity.

weekdays.name: Guildsday
weekdays.description: The fourth day of the week, when rare goods are sold in exclusive markets in the Chasm and Turbine Halls.

weekdays.name: Alumnsday
weekdays.description: The fifth day of the week, marking the beginning of the weekend festivities on its eve.

weekdays.name: Iconsday
weekdays.description: The sixth and final day of the week, devoted to rest, feasting, and honoring the Icons.

watches.name: Morning Watch
watches.description: The first six-hour watch of the day, from midnight to dawn in Ship City Standard time.

watches.name: Day Watch
watches.description: The second six-hour watch, covering the daylight working hours.

watches.name: Evening Watch
watches.description: The third six-hour watch, from noon through the evening hours.

watches.name: Night Watch
watches.description: The fourth and final six-hour watch, covering the night hours until midnight.

dateFormats.long: {{ss-weekday format="name"}}, the {{ss-day format="ordinal"}} of {{ss-month format="name"}} in Cycle-Orbit {{year}}
